article: The bullet train D106 from Changsha to Shanghai has a short stop in Quzhou for only one minute. Named  _  the letter D, the new trains run at speeds of 200 to 250 kilometers one hour. This is much  _  than Z-type and T-type trains. For example, it  used to  take people 12 hours to travel from Shanghai to Beijing. But now it only  _  10. The most interesting part of the bullet trains is the revolving seats. People can adjust their seats as they like, so that it is  _  for you to talk with others around you face to face. The new trains run  _  big cities. They  _  the long trips much faster and more comfortable. However, many passengers still won't choose the bullet trains  _  some reasons. The ticket  _  of the bullet trains are much higher. For example, a hard seat ticket from Beijing to Jinan is only 90 yuan for T-type trains. But on the bullet trains all the seats are  _  . And they cost 153 to 184 yuan. On the other hand, the bullet trains don't stop at small stations.
